ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: apiaen na yaken ni akay a mapacici sia am, ipanci na o mabnek na ciriciring no peyciamahatawan. teymasonong o ipanci na ciriciring no tao, mangay do ciriciring no Ipong a ka no Amis a ka no ciriciring no dehdeh o katenngan na a ipanci.

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: nipacici ko o rarakeh ori ipakateneng ko jia no kalialikey na pa am ninanao da no ciriciring no Ipong. no kalavayo na am nimasaneb a mangay do Taitong a manlangi do mogis no Amis, ori nipaciboang na. o ciriciring rana no dehdeh am, na nimahap do aro a kagagan na dehdeh, ori na ikaro no na katenengan a ipanci a ciriciring ang.

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: yakan kani ama nimangay namen itazogaw si maran nokakyab.

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: koan na yamen, nimakava o atep no vahay na kangyan no tong.

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: no kapivazay na do atep no vahay am, nimakas do atep a mizahza..

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: ko na itaytaydan si maran am, na azwazwain yaken ka namakarang a apiya so ka mawmawgan""

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: 2022 no kawan, pikaygi da abnekan no seyvo o ngaran do mibonsyow no yancomin.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: pacicihen ko masanib a mazyak no vazay a abneken o mibonsyo no yancomin si Tahaw tao do pangso.
I interviewed si Tahaw, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年si Tahaw。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: yaken kani ya misirisiring namen a si niciyo ranam mangay ko do vahay da a pacicien.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: pacicinen ko na do vahay da ka panci na jiaken so nikapwan no ngaran na, a ka pitotwaw da saka vahay ipakasingkad ko jira saka vahay kano sira sakayli.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: pacicien ko ikongo o mo kazyakan nya do paliten o ngaran no yancomin. marahet o adan a ipadket so ngaran?

我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: koan na yaken ni Tahaw, ta manoyong o pipipangayan no ngaran do cyokok, aro sira manci nyaken A-na, ikaro a malas a mapaming dang.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \A-na

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: koan na ni Tahaw am, “vatvatkan no yancomin a manoyong a ngaran namen do tao. ikasawop namen malayma tao do pongso, mapo ya do nyapowan namen, ngaran namen do pongso a makdeng ya, inaoy no aroa tao mababnek so ngaran do tao a yancomin.”
si Tahaw said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35869/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: si Tahaw說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: no kakyab am yakena kani akes a nimangay do pananazangan a mananazang so iyakan, aro nipalolo na ni akes o insay a nimowmowa na. kapamareng na sya so maganinam a iyakan no yancomin.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: da teykaza no tao o pananazangan ni akes, aro o nisazangan da o voong no wakay aka no omaom, tahaman no aro a tao o nirotongan ni akes ri.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the Sweet potato leaves and bird’s nest fern, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，地瓜葉和山蘇很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: o nipasisit na o omaom aka no nyamay na nimay ni akes am teymaganinam ri. aka no nitazaban na taroy ya, teyapiya kakanan na ori ikaroo no manazang sya, ya miyatoatonton sira do pananazangan ni akes.
The bird’s nest fern and  Taro cake she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的山蘇和芋頭糕非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: no yamapasisit si akes am, ko manalanala so manazang a tao. ko macyak a ipaci no, “nimownowa namen ya, teyapya ya a aboo kosozi jia, key! mai kamo manazang ang.”

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: ya nimakaykai na kabo rana no iyakan a nipanazang, koan na ni akes: mina imo ri a nisomidong jiaken.

Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.

ya na ikapito no toki am ko mangay do ga: macita ko si akes a makza no iyakan ta do pongso, isaray ko a ikazway do onowned ko.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
